attributes.action: Legalise Bullfighting In The United Kingdom and all her Terriotories abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bullfighting is a fabulous sport that, if studied correctly is not barbaric or cruel in any way shape or form.

We urge The PM to revoke the ban of the Sport in The UK and to allow the sport to be practiced freely.

There have been many English Toreros over the years whom have not been allowed to practice their art in their own country is this fair ?
